https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wkAEvWfagbUPI6FdZjbEqrXTTr7.jpg The film tells a story of two scrap pickers - the title hero Edi and his friend Jureczek. Edi is wrongly accused of having raped the girl whose brothers have got the control over one of the city areas. Edi is severely punished for that but he accepts his fate taking care of the girl's child. Edi
